post.description: Create new user.

Authenticates user with username and password. Upon successfull authentication the service returns an access token and user profile data. Access token is used to authenticate further requests by setting 'X-User-Token' header to the returned value.

accessToken.description: Access token to be used for authorisation

get.description: Retrieves information for a given user ID

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Uniques user id of the user to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Max number of results in search

pageSize.description: Max number of entries in page

post.description: Reset password for a given username
Change password for a given token

parameters.name: sptoken
parameters.description: Password reset token received in email

put.description: Upgate password for for current user

201.description: Email has been verified and authenticated

accessToken.description: Access token to be used for authorisation

post.description: Logs out authenticated user
Set LoL identity

parameters.description: LoL user identity to find and set

200.description: LoL identity was found and set

405.description: User is not allowed to set LoL identity

503.description: LoL service was not available to complete operation

405.description: User is not allowed to delete LoL identity

423.description: Game cannot be started, inappropriate status

parameters.name: vote
parameters.description: true is for cancelling the game, false is against cancelling

403.description: Cannot be canceled, not a member

410.description: Vote against accepted, voting failed and reset

423.description: Game cannot be canceled, wrong status

parameters.description: List of user Ids to send notification to

400.description: Cannot join due to wrong data provided

400.description: Cannot join due to wrong data provided

post.description: Reject invitation to a game
Join team of the game. The user must be in a lobby already. Can be used to change team or go back to lobby.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: ID of the team to join

400.description: Cannot join due to wrong data provided

post.description: Leave game lobby. Creator cannot leave the game

400.description: Cannot leave due to wrong data provided

delete.description: Kick player from game lobby. Only creator can kick. Kicked user will get notification.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: Id of player to be kicked

post.description: Ask for game resolution. User must be a game participant. Game participants must have LoL identities setup. Game must be started BEFORE LoL game is finished. Game status, user results and wins and losses will be updated accordingly.

102.description: Game is being resolved right now

400.description: Cannot due to wrong data provided

409.description: Conflicting results or user identities were discovered

get.description: Get chat messages recorded for game

403.description: User does not belong to that game

Subscribe to receive friend invitations

Subscribe to receive game deletions

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Uniques user id of the user to retrieve

referenceId.description: Reference to supporting data. E.g. supporting game id

enabled.description: Indicates whenther user is enabled or disabled

online.description: Indicates whenther user is online (has active WebSocket sessions)

confirmed.description: Indicates if platform identity was confirmed

teamId.description: Id of the team player assigned to. LOBBY if in the lobby.

ready.description: Indicated if player is ready to play

invitingId.description: Id of user created the invitation

state.description: State of the invitation describing the context when the invitation is received via subscription. CREATED = just created to invite a user (you); ACCEPTED = user accepted the (your) invitation and joined the game; REJECTED = user declined the (your) invitation.

playerId.description: Id of user created the vote

vote.description: True if user wants to cancel this game

canJoin.description: Indicates if players can join the game

canStart.description: Indicates if owner can start the game

creatorId.description: Id of user who created the game

created_date.description: Timestamp when the game was created

started_date.description: Timestamp when the game was started

completed_date.description: Timestamp when the game was completed

allPlayersReady.description: Indicates if all players are ready to play
